resources.string: "The arcade games aren't plugged in. Check your Internet connection to power them up."

"Deleting your data from archived games will remove your scores, progress and game settings that you have defined via Google Play Games.
This action cannot be undone!"

"Deleting your data for '%1$s' will remove your scores, progress and game settings that you have provided using Google Play Games.
This action cannot be undone!"
"There was an error deleting your data for '%1$s'. Please try again later."
"Delete individual data for games that you've played using Google Play Games. This will delete your scores, progress and game settings for the game that you select."
"Your data for '%1$s' will be deleted within 24 hours."
Delete all your data in Google Play Games, including your Gamer ID and XP. This may also delete your scores, progress and settings in games that you’ve played.
Failed to load the list of games that you have played using Google Play Games. Please try again later.
Loading list of games that you have played using Google Play Games.
%1$s is unavailable. Please try again later.
Oops, it looks like something went wrong. Error code: %1$d
Oops, it looks like something went wrong. Please check your Internet connection.
Oops! It looks like initialisation went wrong.
See what others are playing and get recommendations on the best new games
Oops, it looks like something went wrong.
Hmm! Something went wrong – try again later
View player profiles and leaderboards and see all your games in one place with the Google Play Games app
Showing games library with %1$d games installed, %2$d games available to try now and %3$d games not installed.
Something went wrong. Please try again later.

Whenever you search for players nearby, Google Play Games will temporarily turn on and use the following technologies to find players: Your location, microphone, speaker, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. Learn more".
When Nearby Players is turned on, other players of this game who are nearby can search for and see your name and picture while you are searching."
"Couldn't send gift. Please try again later."
"You can make your level, XP and favourite genres public. This information will be based on all games that you've played."

"You can use your Gamer ID in games that support Play Games login. When you play a game, a developer receives your profile information, activity and purchases in the game. Developers use this data to provide and improve the game, subject to their privacy policies.
You can edit your profile and settings, or delete data stored with Google, subject to Google's privacy policy. To agree, select 'Accept'."

You can use your Gamer ID in games that support Play Games login. When you play a game, a developer receives your profile information, activity and purchases in the game. Developers use this data to provide and improve the game, subject to their privacy policies. Learn more".
You can edit your profile and settings, or delete data stored with Google, subject to ""Google's privacy policy"". To agree, tap 'Create'."

You can use your Gamer ID in games that support Play Games login. When you play a game, a developer receives your profile information, activity and purchases in the game. Developers use this data to provide and improve the game, subject to their privacy policies. Learn more".
You can edit your profile and settings, or delete data stored with Google, subject to ""Google's privacy policy"". To agree, tap 'Save'."
"You can make your gameplay activity, level and XP public. This information will be based on all games that you've played. "Find out more
"Couldn't accept quest. Please try again later."
Try sending a gift – you just might get one in return.

"This action will delete all of your information in Google Play Games, including your Gamer ID and XP. This may also delete your scores, progress and settings in games that you play.
This action cannot be undone!"
This device has no microphone, the microphone is in use by another app or a permission is missing
Recording error: Timed out while saving, may recover
Anything on your screen – including notifications, calls, passwords – and nearby sounds will be recorded.
Try to eliminate background sounds, so that you don’t record anything to which you don’t have rights.
"Choose at what quality you'd like your videos recorded. Connect to Wi-Fi to avoid incurring data charges when streaming."
